QuestData.Title: Dead Zone
QuestData.Description: A Klaxxi'va whispers to the tower. It carries their whisper far; to other towers, to mantid, to paragons. The whisper bounces back, and the Klaxxi hear it.$B$BThis way, they see all.$B$BA tower near the palace is quiet. This will not do. It must sing for the Klaxxi.$B$BIt is my job to fix the tower, but if you serve the Klaxxi, you should serve me as well. You fix the tower, and I will wait here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Klaxxi Resonating Crystal on the Inactive Sonic Relay at the Heart of Fear.$B$BSpeak with Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver at Klaxxi'vess for a ride to the Heart of Fear.
QuestData.RewardText: <As the crystal buzzes to life, a harsh mantid voice permeates your mind.>
